lines.gurmukhi: isMmiRiq purwn kotwin bKwn bhu Bwgvq byd ibAwkrn gIqw
lines.transliteration_english: Sinmriti Puraan Kotaani Bakhaan Bahu , Bhaagavat Bayd Biaakaran Geetaa ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Jholana  - If all the 31 Simrities, 18 Purans, Bhagvad Geeta, four Vedas and their grammar become millions and speak,

lines.gurmukhi: sys mrjys AKlys sur mhys mun jgqu Ar Bgiq sur nr AqIqw
lines.transliteration_english: Says Marajays Akhalays Sur Mahays Mouna , Jagatu Ar Bhagati Sur Nar Ateetaa ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If Shesh Nag of thousands of tongues, Dharamraj, Kuber and other gods, Shiva and hermits and saints of the whole world, noble men get together in millions and speak;

lines.gurmukhi: igAwn Ar iDAwn aunmwn aunmn aukiq rwg nwid idj surmiq nIqw
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Ar Dhiaan Ounamaan Ounaman Oukati , Raag Naadi Dij Suramati Neetaa ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If seekers of many type of knowledge, contemplations and wise men who discuss various subjects, people of higher spiritual state, who can speak about various skills, all the Ragas and their seven notes, knowledgeable scholars, goddess Saraswati and many s

lines.gurmukhi: ArD lg mwqR gur sbd AKr myk Agm Aiq Agm AgwiD mIqw ]540]
lines.transliteration_english: Aradh Lag Maatr Gur Sabad Akhar Mayka , Agam Ati Agam Agaadhi Meetaa ?540?

Shabad OS B.translation: O friend! all the above will fall woefully short of saying the praise of a syllable of the True Guru's blessed Naam Gur Mantar. The significance of Guru's words is beyond the extent of all knowledge.  (540)
